title: Listing of Applicable Laws
text_content:
The Code of Virginia sections listed below are those Virginia Motor Vehicle Laws which authorize the Department of Motor Vehicles to conduct the Insurance Verification Processes.
§
46.2-371--388
- Driver to give immediate notice of certain accidents.
§
46.2-417--429
- Suspension of Licenses for Unsatisfied Judgement and After Certain Accidents.
§
46.2-430--434
- Suspension of Licenses of Nonresidents or Accidents in Other States.
§
46.2-435--463
- Proof of Financial Responsibility.
§
46.2-464--471
- Assignment of Insurance Risks.
§
46.2-472--482
- Motor Vehicle Liability Insurance Policies.
§
46.2-705--710
- Registration of Uninsured Motor Vehicles.
§
38.2-2206--3001
- State Corporation Commission Laws.
